name: Luminosity (itch) (Brontosaurus G, grace.rigoni, Frances, Spencer G, rosko vair)
name_original: Luminosity (itch) (Brontosaurus G, grace.rigoni, Frances, Spencer G, rosko vair)
description:
Submission for the 7DFPS Jam.

Project RGB is a light-based puzzle game in Unreal Engine 5 in which players manipulate red, green and blue lights generated from crystals. Mix them together and use them to traverse through the world and solve puzzles.

This is a prototype I am partially remaking for a vertical slice.

Controls:
WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look
